name: The Faceless Double
detailed_description:
This world is cursed...



In this world, there sometimes appears a comet that grants wishes.
It is said that the comet will grant any wish – however, payment for a granted wish takes the form of a curse.
The people of this world called the comet “God”.

When Double awakened, he had lost his previous form.
He can’t remember how this happened.
Cloena proposes to Double that they embark on a journey to seek out God, in order to remove the curse.





Double
Voice: Hideyoshi Bito
The hero of our story. His name can be changed.
A young man who currently consists of only a soul.
He embarks on a journey to seek out God in order to remove the curse that has been placed upon him.

As long s he has a vessel, he can also turn into other people.


Cloena
Voice: Nozomi Yukimura
Energetic and full of vigor, Cloena is a young boy who thinks of himself as Double’s little brother.
He offers help throughout Double’s journey to find God.
He is apparently able to speak with God.


Lutchiana
Voice: Itsuki Natsume
A young female adventurer with robotic legs.
She stands out with her entire body glowing white.
While she comes off as somewhat cold, she also offers helpful advice to Double & co., who are undertaking their first adventure.


Arthion
Voice: Shuji Narumi
A butler-cum-bodyguard employed by Lutchiana’s family.
Secretly following Lutchiana on his journey, he regularly sends reports back to Lutchiana’s father.


Pelcha
Voice: PECO
A small “person”* whom Double and Cloena encounter while trying to leave the forest.
*Probably a “person”.
Recognized by an extremely unique manner of speaking, that tiny little body moves in ways you’d never expect to be possible.



*planned

The following items are currently being planned for inclusion in the game.

Simply put, this is an adventure game in which you advance through the story while solving various puzzles and riddles that pop up along the way.

Double and his crew will travel to a variety of strange lands on the quest to find God, and will have to take on the various challenges these lands currently face.
Join Double & co. on their adventure and help them to overcome the dangers and problems plaguing each land they visit!

◆Choices
Throughout the story, you will be prompted to make a wide variety of choices.
The choices you make will directly affect the protagonists’ futures.

◆Puzzle & Riddle Parts (Story)
Throughout the story, the inhabitants of the strange lands you visit will ask you to solve various puzzles and answer riddles.
If you’re able to properly fulfill the inhabitants’ requests, you can acquire their respective faces as a reward.
(Giving a wrong answer will cause damage to be incurred, and the game ends once your HP hits 0.)

◆Action Parts (Story)
There are also some parts of the story in which action game-like events containing puzzle-solving elements will occur.
Take advantage of the various faces you’ve acquired to clear these events.
(Failure to avoid obstacles will cause damage to be incurred, and the game ends once your HP hits 0.)



・Bonus room (After clearing the game, you can experience a wealth of sub-stories and their respective elements)
・Additional branching endings



The largest appeal of △○□× (Miwashiba)’s games would likely be the intricate stories and the miraculously immersive in-game worlds, painstakingly crafted from top to bottom.
Start up a game after being intrigued by Miwashiba’s cute characters and graphics, and by the end, you’re irretrievably hooked.
The fact that Miwashiba’s previous game, LiEat, currently boasts over 100,000 downloads worldwide – with no signs of slowing down! – serves as further testament to this.

When all is said and done, is a person really able to “become” anything at all? Is there “something” that you would like to become – even if it meant being cursed?

short_description: “This world is cursed...” The latest tale from LiEat creator △○□× (Miwashiba). Having lost his very form, our hero Double embarks on a journey to remove his curse. What exactly is “God”? What does it mean to be “cursed”? Why is Double able to become other people?
